author: @roysebastian8284

text:
Ampere Magnus electric scooter has been nothing but a headache from the moment I purchased it. First off, let's talk about the charger. Yes, it comes with a supposed 5-year warranty, but guess what? Mine decided to kick the bucket after just 2 years of use. No big deal, right? Wrong. When I tried to claim my warranty for the charger, the company had the audacity to blame it on water damage!

Now, here's the kicker - there was absolutely no water damage to be found by the dealer where I submitted my charger for warranty claim. But oh no, Ampere wants to play the blame game and avoid their responsibilities. It's been over a month now since I submitted my charger, and what do I have to show for it? Nothing. Zilch. Nada.

Not only have I not received a backup charger during this time, but the supposed "repaired" charger they sent back was also conveniently labeled as water damaged. What a load of rubbish! It's clear that Ampere doesn't stand by their warranty claims and would rather fabricate excuses than provide decent customer service.

Save yourself the trouble and steer clear of the Ampere Magnus electric scooter. It's not worth the headache, frustration, and false promises.
